instruction: Describe a way to stay safe during a pandemic.
output: Staying safe during a pandemic is no easy task. It is important to follow all official government guidance and stay home as much as possible. When going out, it is important to wear a mask, maintain six feet of distance from other people, and avoid large gatherings. Be sure to wash your hands often, cover your mouth and nose when sneezing and coughing, and disinfect regularly touched surfaces.
